languages.text: {n}Оглушительную тишину нарушает Бригадир.{/n} "Император послал нам столь близк{mf|ого|ую} к народу Лорд-капитана! Этот котел отныне благословлен!" {n}Толпа взрывается ликованием, а ложку, которой вы орудовали, передают из рук в руки как реликвию.{/n}

{n}The Foreman's voice breaks the stunned silence:{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a Lord Captain who walks beside {mf|his|her} people! From here on out, this vat is blessed!" {n}The crowd explodes with cheers, and the spoon that you just used starts trading hands as if it were a holy relic.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Оглушительную тишину нарушает Бригадир.{/n} "Император послал нам столь близк{mf|ого|ую} к народу Лорд-капитана! Этот котел отныне благословлен!" {n}Толпа взрывается ликованием, а ложку, которой вы орудовали, передают из рук в руки как реликвию.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Vorarbeiters durchbricht die angespannte Stille:{/n} "Der Imperator hat uns einen Lord Captain geschickt, der an der Seite {mf|seiner|ihrer} Leute steht! Von nun an ist dieses Fass gesegnet!" {n}Die Menge bricht in Jubel aus und der Löffel, den du gerade benutzt hast, wird weitergereicht, als wäre er eine heilige Reliquie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's voice breaks the stunned silence:{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a Lord Captain who walks beside {mf|his|her} people! From here on out, this vat is blessed!" {n}The crowd explodes with cheers, and the spoon that you just used starts trading hands as if it were a holy relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Vorarbeiters durchbricht die angespannte Stille:{/n} "Der Imperator hat uns einen Lord Captain geschickt, der an der Seite {mf|seiner|ihrer} Leute steht! Von nun an ist dieses Fass gesegnet!" {n}Die Menge bricht in Jubel aus und der Löffel, den du gerade benutzt hast, wird weitergereicht, als wäre er eine heilige Reliquie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La voix du contremaître rompt le silence :{/n} « L'Empereur nous a envoyé {mf|un seigneur-capitaine|une seigneure-capitaine} qui nous ressemble ! Cette cuve est désormais bénie ! » {n}La foule éclate de joie et la cuillère que vous venez d'utiliser passe de mains en mains à la manière une relique sacrée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's voice breaks the stunned silence:{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a Lord Captain who walks beside {mf|his|her} people! From here on out, this vat is blessed!" {n}The crowd explodes with cheers, and the spoon that you just used starts trading hands as if it were a holy relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du contremaître rompt le silence :{/n} « L'Empereur nous a envoyé {mf|un seigneur-capitaine|une seigneure-capitaine} qui nous ressemble ! Cette cuve est désormais bénie ! » {n}La foule éclate de joie et la cuillère que vous venez d'utiliser passe de mains en mains à la manière une relique sacrée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La voz del capataz rompe el silencio:{/n} «¡El Emperador nos ha mandado {mf|un|una} Lord Capitán que no teme codearse con sus súbditos! ¡A partir de este momento, esta cuba queda bendecida!». {n}La muchedumbre prorrumpe en vítores, y la cuchara que acabas de utilizar cambia de manos como si fuese una sagrada reliquia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's voice breaks the stunned silence:{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a Lord Captain who walks beside {mf|his|her} people! From here on out, this vat is blessed!" {n}The crowd explodes with cheers, and the spoon that you just used starts trading hands as if it were a holy relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del capataz rompe el silencio:{/n} «¡El Emperador nos ha mandado {mf|un|una} Lord Capitán que no teme codearse con sus súbditos! ¡A partir de este momento, esta cuba queda bendecida!». {n}La muchedumbre prorrumpe en vítores, y la cuchara que acabas de utilizar cambia de manos como si fuese una sagrada reliquia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}呆然とした沈黙を、作業長の声が破る。{/n}「皇帝は我らに、その人民のそばを歩むロード・キャプテンを遣わされた！このタンクは祝福されている！」{n}群衆は爆発的な歓声で包まれ、あなたが使ったばかりのスプーンが聖遺物であるかのように、人々の手を渡っていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's voice breaks the stunned silence:{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a Lord Captain who walks beside {mf|his|her} people! From here on out, this vat is blessed!" {n}The crowd explodes with cheers, and the spoon that you just used starts trading hands as if it were a holy relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}呆然とした沈黙を、作業長の声が破る。{/n}「皇帝は我らに、その人民のそばを歩むロード・キャプテンを遣わされた！このタンクは祝福されている！」{n}群衆は爆発的な歓声で包まれ、あなたが使ったばかりのスプーンが聖遺物であるかのように、人々の手を渡っていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}工头的声音打破了所有人震惊的沉默。{/n}“神皇派来的舰长大人，与{mf|他|她}的人民打成了一片！从今天开始，这个大缸就是受到神皇祝福的大缸！”{n}人群中爆发出了欢呼声，所有人都在传着看你刚刚用过的勺子，就仿佛它是件圣物一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's voice breaks the stunned silence:{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a Lord Captain who walks beside {mf|his|her} people! From here on out, this vat is blessed!" {n}The crowd explodes with cheers, and the spoon that you just used starts trading hands as if it were a holy relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}工头的声音打破了所有人震惊的沉默。{/n}“神皇派来的舰长大人，与{mf|他|她}的人民打成了一片！从今天开始，这个大缸就是受到神皇祝福的大缸！”{n}人群中爆发出了欢呼声，所有人都在传着看你刚刚用过的勺子，就仿佛它是件圣物一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ustabaşı'nın sesi, şaşkına dönmüş sessizliği bozuyor.{/n} "İmparator, bize halkıyla beraber yürüyen bir Lord Kaptan gönderdi! Bu günden itibaren bu tank kutsanmış sayılır!" {n}Kalabalık, tezahüratlarla çılgına dönüyor. Az önce kullandığın kaşık ise kutsal bir yadigâr misali elden ele dolaşmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's voice breaks the stunned silence:{/n} "The Emperor has sent us a Lord Captain who walks beside {mf|his|her} people! From here on out, this vat is blessed!" {n}The crowd explodes with cheers, and the spoon that you just used starts trading hands as if it were a holy relic.{/n}
